channel.title: I need help deleting all my rares
channel.description: I need something or some kind of method will delete all of my rares like partyhats, masks, etc. I have over 20k char files so I can't just do it one by one. Is this possible to make?

item.description:

ScanAccounts.main(ScanAccounts.java:90) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedReader.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at ScanAccounts.parseFiles(ScanAccounts.java:30) at ScanAccounts.<init>(ScanAccounts.java:22) at ScanAccounts.main(ScanAccounts.java:90) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedReader.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at ScanAccounts.parseFiles(ScanAccounts.java:30) at ScanAccounts.<init>(ScanAccounts.java:22) at ScanAccounts.main(ScanAccounts.java:90) java.io.IOException: Stream closed at java.io.BufferedReader.ensureOpen(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) at ScanAccounts.parseFiles(ScanAccounts.java:30) ScanAccounts.parseFiles(ScanAccounts.java:45) at ScanAccounts.<init>(ScanAccounts.java:22) at ScanAccounts.main(ScanAccounts.java:90) Scanning.... Done Press any key to continue . . . Am I missing something? It said something in the readme about the data folder and making sure I have one? I do have one but is that used for anything?

item.source: I need help deleting all my rares

item.title: I need help deleting all my rares
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

edit “run account scan” and replace it with:

@echo off
title ScanAccounts
java -Xmx512m -cp .;. ScanAccounts
echo Scanning....
echo Done
pause

That should work

Also in you run server if you want you could remove the:

jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar

so it looks like

@echo off
color 0a
title Universalscape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;. server

You server compiler should compile it if all your files are in the main folder.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help deleting all my rares

item.title: I need help deleting all my rares
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Runserver: @echo off color 0a title Universalscape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

I used my other compiler to compile the files and it made a .class file for my ScanAccounts file. Is that all it’s supposed to do or is the other compiler supposed to do more?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help deleting all my rares

item.title: I need help deleting all my rares
item.dc:creator: @Monkey_wacko Monkey wacko
item.description:
@Monkey_wacko wrote:

[quote=“skittle385, post:8, topic:264604”]lolz just make a reg deleting bat file…

@echo off
del C:/Documents and Settings/YOURLOGGEDONNAMEHERE/PATHTOCHARACTER FILES[/quote]

That’s the way to delete every character

[quote=“runefreak10, post:7, topic:264604”]Compiler: @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

And in ScanAccounts.java, is this all the items that get deleted from the server? private int getRareItems(int item) { int[] rareItems = { 1040, 1041, 1464, 6128, 6129, 6130, 6145, 6151, 4068, 4503, 4508, 4507 Then I just edit that to my items?[/quote]

Just edit that to delete what items u want. I have never seen a batch file like that i mean to say post you run.bat file here.

Read full topic

Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

And in ScanAccounts.java, is this all the items that get deleted from the server? private int getRareItems(int item) { int[] rareItems = { 1040, 1041, 1464, 6128, 6129, 6130, 6145, 6151, 4068, 4503, 4508, 4507 Then I just edit that to my items?
